meanings.definition: The quality or state of being habitual.
meanings.sent1: Her habitualness in arriving early to work impressed her boss.
meanings.sent2: His habitualness in brushing his teeth before bed is a good habit.
meanings.sent3: The cat's habitualness in napping in the sun always brings a smile to my face.
meanings.sent4: The habitualness of the old clock's ticking filled the room with a sense of comfort.
meanings.sent5: The habitualness of the morning routine made it easy to start the day.

meanings.definition: The tendency to do something regularly or repeatedly.
meanings.sent1: The student's habitualness in asking questions showed her curiosity.
meanings.sent2: His habitualness in checking his phone every few minutes was distracting.
meanings.sent3: The dog's habitualness in chasing its tail never fails to entertain us.
meanings.sent4: The habitualness of the waves crashing against the shore was calming.
meanings.sent5: The habitualness of his laughter brightened up the room.
